name: Captain Kaon
description: Captain Kaon is a retro twin-stick gravity shooter inspired by 1980s classics such as Thrust and Gravitar. Captain Kaon pairs vibrant Amiga-style pixel art with a tight twin-stick control mechanic. Relive this forgotten shmup sub-genre!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Direct-X 9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Direct-X 9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
